title: Apple releases iOS 15.4 beta 4 and more to developers and public beta users
content:
One week after releasing the third beta to developers, Apple is now rolling out iOS 15.4 beta 4 to developers and public beta testers. The company also has a new beta of iPadOS 15.4. Head below for the full details on these latest releases from Apple. 

more…
